abstract: guide to financial statement requirements in us securities offerings by us issuers 2018 .
article: the most frequently asked question at all-hands meetings for a securities offering is `` what financial statements will be needed ? '' the question seems simple enough . but the answer is rarely straightforward . this user 's guide is designed to provide a roadmap to help navigate the financial statement requirements of the federal securities laws . we focus principally on the requirements for new registration statements in public offerings , including initial public offerings by emerging growth companies under the jobs act . we also summarize briefly the practices in the rule 144a market , as well as the special rules applicable to `` foreign private issuers . ''
